comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://hydl.huya.com/mobile/kiwi-android/12.5.25/huya-12.5.25-100687-live.apk

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

你好，我提的这个issue其实与广告无关，但还是想着尝试提一下。在中国很多公司为了节省网络费用，因此就在软件中默认启用pcdn等技术，以此来降低费用，但是中国的网络运营商打击pcdn，有一些用户因为软件的pcdn上传了太多流量，比如一天内上传了几TB，然后导致宽带被限速或者封禁。于是我收集了很多pcdn域名，希望能够添加到Adguard DNS过滤器中，这个pcdn很恶心，影响到不少人了。下面的部分域名出现在上面下载链接对应的软件

你好，我提的这个issue其实与广告无关，但还是想着尝试提一下。在中国很多公司为了节省网络费用，因此就在软件中默认启用pcdn等技术，以此来降低费用，但是中国的网络运营商打击pcdn，有一些用户因为软件的pcdn上传了太多流量，比如一天内上传了几TB，然后导致宽带被限速或者封禁。于是我收集了很多pcdn域名，希望能够添加到Adguard DNS过滤器中，这个pcdn很恶心，影响到不少人了。下面的部分域名出现在上面下载链接对应的软件

comment.body:
> Сбросил настройки. При выбранной реализации DNS "AdGuard" и DNS-сервере "Системный (Обычный)" все работает. Но я не знаю, насколько он блокирует все трекеры.

Если сейчас всё работает - попробуйте выбрать только сервер ADGuard, не меняя другие настройки 
(состояние фильтра DNS тоже пока не меняйте). Если твитч будет сломан - проверьте с нефильтрующим.

Без включения фильтра DNS AdGuard, с системным DNS фильтрации не будет (если выбранный в системе или роутере сам ничего не блокирует).

comment.body:
> Если сейчас всё работает - попробуйте выбрать только сервер ADGuard, не меняя другие настройки

Вот, что я сделал:

1. Оставил реализацию DNS AdGuard
2. Выбрал сервер AdGuard-DNS (DNS-over-HTTPS)

При этом Twitch не работает. DNS фильтр включен.
Затем выбрал сервер ADGuard-DNS без фильтрации, та же проблема. Реализацию DNS оставил прежней - Adguard.
Если нужно, могу проделать то же самое на Android-устройстве для проверки.
Спасибо!

```suggestion
@@||beinconnect.com.tr^$stealth
```
to weak. If a problem caused by a specific option(-s) we use specific options (except some old rules - stealth mode was improved later)

comment.body:
@ntnguyen1234 It is caused by blocking a cookie popup.
Please for different platforms, because with Content Blocker for Android or free version of AG for iOS the site will be broken.

Unblocking rule can be added with a hint with the necessary platforms
`!+ PLATFORM(ext_android_cb, ios)` (sometimes for safari also required, if a problem with applying a scriptlet solution)
or with a directive, if more than one rule.

issue.title: Fix #201046 content.yudu.com
issue.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/201046

Currently I don't see this rule reported in AG Filtering Log nor browser console. Should we convert to `set-constant` scriptlet?

comment.body:
> Currently I don't see this rule reported in AG Filtering Log nor browser console.

It is generic, so not displayed in the log (when many frames - many lines with this rule will be shown. I am not sure if current behaviour is good).
Btw replaced JS by scriptlet and removed `#@%#` rules. It seems they were obsolete.

For this case better add new `#@%#` rule, or fix by another rule if possible.

commits.message: Changed Battery Status API rule - JS=>scriptlet
